resources.string:
Receiving a Loan by Visiting the Bank
 1. Choose loans page in app
 2. Loans → My loans
 3. Ensure loan is approved
 4. Select your nearest bank
 5. Gather all documents as requested
 6. Go to tha bank and receive your loan 
 
 Receiving a Loan by Withdrawing on Bank Card
 1. Choose loans page in app
 2. Loans → My loans → withdraw
 3. Select card 
 4. Fill your card info 
 5. Confirm card details.
 6. Withdraw the loan amount.
 7. Check your bank account for the credited amount.
